title: 2019 Week 17 Preview
itunes:title: 2019 Week 17 Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, and Gregg Rosenthal preview each upcoming game of Week 17. The Patriots are looking for their playoff bye against the Miami dolphins (35:40), the Vikings offense is looking to turn it around against the Bears (41:07) and the Raiders take on the Broncos as they fight for a playoff spot. (51:53) The heroes spin through the remaining teams with no playoff ramifications with a Week 17 speed round (58:05) and preview the Seahawks 49ers game to close the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
